name: MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2022
description:
YOUR MLB baseball game is BACK with MLB Tap Sports™ Baseball 2022! Hit it out of the park and continue your MLB dynasty with the best baseball players!

Baseball games come to your phone with MLB Tap Sports Baseball. Manage a dream team of real MLB players and travel to authentic ball parks. Set your lineup and play ball! Can you take your team to the top? Tap to play and hit a home run with easy to learn controls.

WHAT’S NEW IN TSB22
• AVATARS with gear to collect, customize and give your team the extra edge
• BRAND NEW LEADERBOARDS to smash your way to the top
• LIMITED TIME seasonal rewards in our new Champion Progression Tier in events that test your competitive edge
• CONNECT your TSB account to keep your All-Star Levels, bring over Keepers from TSB, and much more!
• MORE REWARDS from fresh Club events and Weekly Content
• 45 MILLION franchise downloads and counting

The COMPLETE MLB Experience!
• AUTHENTIC MLB in every way – 2022 MLB Teams, MLBPA Players, and MLB Ballparks
• COLLECT MLB players – From current superstars to the all time greats
• TEAM UP with baseball fans to dominate in Club Events and share the rewards
• PLAY ALL DAY with countless game modes: Slugfest, Home Run Battles, Walk Off Hero, Event Royale, Pick’em, Season Mode, Pitching Labs, Club Rally, and many more.
• ALWAYS FRESH with content and challenges based on the REAL LIVE events of the MLB. Live-op events based on what’s happening with the MLB Season

DRAFT your lineup and BUILD YOUR TEAM
• CREATE your own player and add him to your team. Will he be the X-Factor?
• TEAM UP with baseball fans to dominate in Club Events and share the rewards
• COLLECT and upgrade your gear for a fresh look and extra team bonuses

Build your team and create your own MLB dynasty in your baseball game: MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2022!
